cv_text: John Wood Senior Business Analyst: Analytical Decision-Making & Growth \ +1-925-885-5155 help@enhancv.com SUMMARY Senior Business Analyst with 12+ years of experience in using various business intelligence and modelling tools to assess companies' needs and determine sustainable and effective course of action. cv_text: Summary Business Analyst experienced in supporting analytical needs of organizations with prior project/product management experience. Result- oriented individual recognized for effectively resolving challenging issues aspiring to become an Analytics expert. Work Experience = ANALYST [| Extracted data from Sabre, Duetto, and Google Analytics into MS Excel, implemented advanced functionalities like Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP, and Macros to perform data analysis for business; impacting insights & making recommendations. Used predictive analysis to predict the number of guests for any given night to maximize occupancy and increase revenue. Documented monthly e-commerce performance reports in MS Word and created MS PowerPoint presentations for higher management. * Defined KPI and metrics to measure business's success. © Part of diverse, cross-functional teams working towards fulfillment of corporate goals and productivity. Implemented SQL queries using joins and sub queries to retrieve data from the database. prowect MANAGER-INTERN | © = =Managed project requirements using JIRA and Confluence. © = Collected, cleaned, and analyzed data using IFTTT, WeWiredWeb, and MS Excel using functions like Pivot Tables and graphs. © Created mockups and wireframes; documented use cases, activity diagrams, sequence diagrams, and workflow. © = Analyzed and reviewed developer Python and HTML codes. © =©Prepared and executed test plans including documenting and resolving issues. . Documented Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) and Functional Requirement Documents (FRDs). atcat MANAGER-INTERN | Implemented advanced MS Excel functionalities like VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables to forecast revenue based on historical data. © Analyzed old detection cases using JIRA tickets and Salesforce to determine which products have maximum False/True Positives and False/True Negatives. Conducted market analysis and research on other threat intelligence companies to see how they differ from each other. Created innovation games to help engineers decide product features. Coordinated with Product Manager to gather requirements and make modifications and corrections to the product specific documents. Certifications * Scrum Fundamentals Certified (April, 2016) © Microsoft Project 2016: Essential Training (February, 2016) * Hootsuite Certificate Courseware (October, 2015) * IBM DB2 Database and Application Fundamentals (October, 2013) Technical Skills * Database: Oracle 91, MySOL * Software/Tools: VB, MS Visio, Tableau, MS Project Professional, Salesforce, SharePoint Education (MAY, 2016) MS INFORMATION SYSTEMS-BUSINESS ANALYTICS (AUGUST, 2013) BE INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY Academic Projects ANALYTICS PROJECT (2016) e Used regression analysis, Tableau, and forecasting to conclude which states in US should stop the production of GE crops, soil damage, and which crops can be excluded from being produced genetically. DATA WAREHOUSING FOR (2015) © Offered a system design solution to a start-up based on requirements of and data provided by the company. Proposed a data warehouse management plan to manage inventory, sales, and customer data in order to help in day-to-day operations. The plan included gathering requirements, choosing KPI, data quality and data sources analysis, dimensional modeling, ETL system requirements, and budgeting. SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT FOR [J CONSTRUCTIONS PVT. LTD. (2015) * Analyzed operations data to propose a business plan using advanced MS Excel functions like VLOOKUP, Pivot tables, and linear regression. Aimed at improving overhead costs and improved the profit margin of the company by 1.5% per project.

Highly apt at seeing beyond the numbers to provide systematic solutions to increase profit margins by an AVG of 20K/ year. Ability to listen with intent to the customer problems to gather data and find solutions to individual problems. Built a 5000+ customer database through the years, based on loyalty and respect. EXPERIENCE Junior Business Analyst Carroll €3 2020- Ongoing 9 Dallas, TX Carroll is the global leader in cloud-based sales, marketing, learning, and customer experience solutions. + Increased gross revenue of 15% in 2021 (compared to 2020) with no change to fixed costs with data-oriented, customer-centric solutions + Automated manual review process using excel that saved around 1- hour of work per week + Expanded BI Audience by an additional 200+ users by offering new insights and features to the business Research Associate & Intern Business Analyst Grimes 2019-2020 9 Dallas, TX Grimes is the alternative within top-tier executive search and part of the global top-10 executive search firm TRANSEARCH International - one of the leading executive search and leadership advisory organizations in the world. + Improved internal processes by creating manuals to cut back on training time by 30% + Reduced IPS (Customer Issues) by 2.2% while impacting merely 3% of GMV - Supported sales to achieve 132% and 162% quota in 2019 and 2020 Sales Associate Borer Ltd @§ 2018-2019 9 Bronx. NY Borer Ltd is an affiliate brand mainly focused on audience based programmatic display marketing. + Exceeded the incremental spend target by 120% due to providing personalized and customer-focused information + Turned 2500+ cold leads into customers by offering them solutions to their problems and listening carefully to their concerns + Helped with 150+ product launches by making cold calls, collecting and analyzing customer data TRAINING / COURSES Microsoft Excel Expert Data Analysis for Decision- (Excel and Excel 2019) Making Microsoft edxX Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate Coursera www.enhancv.com 9 Dallas, TX SKILLS Bl Data Analysis © MSO Client Management Sales Targets Cold Calling Lead Generation EDUCATION Bachelor of Science in Business and Political Economy New York University &4) 2014 - 2018 9 Manhattan, NY STRENGTHS Data Management Systematic approach towards systematizing and analyzing data with Macros in Excel. Providing growth- focused solutions, increasing profit margins by at least 25%/ year. Customer Growth by 15K/ Year Knowledge of specific niches to implement business growth solutions: from product launches to lead generation. Accumulating a loyal customer base, responsible for the 30% expansion of the business within the past year. Product Expansion Using systematized data to provide opportunities with a focus on enhancing the overall customer experience by an annual AVG of 65%. cv_text: Jordan Kirtley Business Analyst Phone 305-730-3464 Linkedin linkedin.com/in/jordanzkirtley E-mail jordanzkirtley@gmail.com Twitter twitter.com/jordanzkirtley Insightful entry-level business analyst with skills in financial modeling and AWS. Excited to deliver profitable insights at WCS. As MBA student at University of Miami, used financial modeling and guided team of 5 to raise $5,000 for local animal shelter. Education 2017 - 2019 MBA University of Miami Marketing and Sales Project * Conducted senior project in market segmentation, branding, and promotion that raised $5,000 for the Broward County Animal Shelter. * Awarded the Catherine L. Gallardo scholarship for charity work. * Conducted rigorous financial modeling to find best project path. * Recruited and managed team of 5 students and community members to implement project strategy. President, Student Economics Club * Led energetic group of 30+ engaged business students to analyze business trends and build lasting relationships. * Supported and organized 10+ club events such as forums to discuss valuation, strategy, capital markets, and venture capitalism. Pursued Educational Excellence * Excelled in accounting, macroeconomics, marketing, and statistics. * Admitted into Masters Scholar program for academic excellence. 2013 - 2017 BS Business Administration Florida State University * Vice President, Association for Business Communication. * Completed 6-credit senior project in financial modeling. Additional Activities 2015 - 2019 Whitewater Videographer * Chased rafts down Class V rivers daily to create and sell trip videos. * Redesigned pricing scheme to reap 40% more revenue than average. Volunteer Driver, Broward County Animal Shelter * Drove vanloads of 50+ cats and dogs per month to rescues. * Analyzed & restructured loading to fit 20% more animals per trip. Eagle Scout, BSA * Recognized for work ethic and interpersonal skills. * Completed Eagle project that raised $4,300 for disabled in Ghana. Skills financial modeling future state assessment gap analysis

cv_text: JOHN DOE Dynamic Entry-Level Business Analyst +1-541-754-3010 john.doe@example.com linkedin.com New York, NY SUMMARY Business Analyst with a strong interest in IT consulting services. Proven ability to define business and technical requirements based on business problems. Skilled in translating and simplifying requirements for optimizing execution and outcomes. Familiar with Agile and Waterfall methodologies. EXPERIENCE Business Analyst Intern 2023 - 2023 XYZ Company New York, NY Defined business and technical requirements based on business problems. Translated and simplified requirements for optimizing execution and outcomes. Contributed to maintaining an environment focused on continuous improvement of the development process. * Defined business and technical requirements, contributing to a 10% increase in project efficiency * Translated and simplified requirements, improving project execution by 20% * Contributed to continuous improvement, leading to a 15% increase in development speed EDUCATION Master's in Computer Science 2021 - 2023 XYZ University New York, NY LANGUAGES English Native eeeecee AWARDS Best Business Project Awarded at XYZ University Powered by CY Enhancy www.enhancv.com MY LIFE PHILOSOPHY The greatest barrier to success is the fear of failure - Sven Goran Eriksson STRENGTHS yw Analytical Skills Proficient in defining business requirements Communication Skills Ability to articulate complex business problems Adaptability Willing to relocate for project- based assignments SKILLS Business Analysis - Requirements Definition - Agile Methodology - Waterfall Methodology - Communication ACHIEVEMENTS # Business Requirements Project Successfully defined business requirements Project Execution Improved project execution significantly Development Speed Contributed to increasing development speed

cv_text: o DETAILS © 143 Main Ave, Orlando, FL, 32804, United States 890-555-0401 mail@exam om DATE / PLACE OF BIRTH 05/10/1983 Orlando, FL NATIONALITY USA DRIVING LICENSE Full © SKILLS © Analytics Requirement Gathering Project Management Documentation Requirement Analysis Continuous Improvement Market Research RACHEL ZANE Business Analyst @ ORLANDO, FL, 32804,UNITED STATES | 890-555-0401 PROFILE Personable and process-oriented Business Analyst with 10 years of experience linking organization's information technology capabilities with its business objectives. EMPLOYMENT HISTORY Sr Business Analyst at Deutsche Bank, New York, New York January 2013 - Present Deutsche Bank is a German global banking and financial services company. As a Sr Business Analyst, my core activities include: e Gathering intelligence from corporate executives and middle managers about needs and future growth e Partnering with application directors and creators to ensure each project meets a specific need e Assuming responsibility for project tasks and ensuring they are completed in a timely fashion e Evaluating, testing, and recommending new opportunities for enhancing our software, hardware, and IT processes e Compiling and distributing reports on application development and deployment Business Analyst at Goldman Sachs, New York, New York June 2000 - January 2013 Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is an American multinational finance company that engages in global investment banking, investment management, securities, and other financial services. As a business analyst, my core activities included: e Designing and executing A/B testing procedures to extract data from test runs e Evaluating and drawing conclusions from data related to customer behavior e Consulting with the executive team and the IT department on the newest technology and its implications in the industry e Creating direct channels of communication to software and application developers to get the job done without managerial interjection Jr Business Analyst at Johnson & Johnson, New York, New York August 1999 — June 2000 Johnson & Johnson is an American multinational medical devices, pharmaceutical and consumer packaged goods manufacturing company. As a Business Analyst, my core activities included: e Identifying business trends utilizing real data, compiling analysis reports that are delivered to developers, and following-up on all results e Implementing a comprehensive management plan for each project and holding regular stakeholder meetings to keep all interested parties updated

cv_text: Michelle Sanders Business Analyst (327) michelle.sanders@yahoo.com unique-take-out.org East Frieda, Saint Kitts and Nevis SUMMARY Experienced Business Analyst with a strong track record of eliciting high- quality requirements, fostering stakeholder collaboration, and driving successful project delivery. Skilled in agile methodologies, business modeling, and effective communication. Accomplished the successful implementation of an automated testing framework, resulting in improved software quality and efficiency. Certified in Business Analysis and proficient in English and Spanish. Committed to meeting user needs and contributing to the achievement of organizational goals. Enthusiastic about joining a forward-thinking company like Tandem to support its mission of creating a fairer and greener banking experience. Ready to bring my expertise and dedication to deliver exceptional results. EXPERIENCE Business Analyst 2022 - Ongoing GreenBank London Led requirement elicitation process and documented user stories with acceptance criteria resulting in a 20% increase in project efficiency. Built strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels to ensure clear communication and mutual commitment. Applied agile methodology and identified and promoted the use of appropriate tools and methodologies. * Facilitated requirements gathering sessions and refined planning strategies * Contributed to the management and prioritization of the Product Backlog * Analyzed business situations to identify the most appropriate modeling methods Senior Business Analyst 2017 - 2022 EcoFinance Cardiff Worked closely with executives and directors to elicit high-quality requirements and conducted cost/benefit analysis leading to a 15% reduction in project risks. Mentored other Business Analysts and shared knowledge and experience to foster professional development. Collaborated with cross-functional teams including Developers, Testers, and Product Owners to ensure successful project delivery. * Contributed to the improvement of business processes resulting in enhanced efficiency * Assisted and supported training activities, including reviewing training materials * Supported implementation and post-implementation activities to ensure smooth operations Powered by (X7 Enhancy www.enhancv.com MY LIFE PHILOSOPHY The future of business analysis lies in understanding and meeting user needs through agile methodologies and effective stakeholder collaboration. STRENGTHS ¥ Effective Communication Proven ability to communicate complex ideas and requirements with clarity, resulting in improved collaboration and successful project outcomes. Problem Solving Strong analytical skills and the ability to identify and address business challenges, resulting in innovative solutions and process improvements. SKILLS Requirements Elicitation - Stakeholder Management - Agile Methodology - Business Modeling - Tool and Methodology Selection - Facilitation - Product Backlog Management - Subject Matter Expertise - User-Centric Design - Effective Communication - Process Improvement - Testing Support
